title: HR Business Partner - Premium Package
imageAlt: A top-down view of a desk with books, glasses, coffee and person's hands taking notes
description: Larger businesses (200+ employees) or those undergoing change who need strategic HR leadership and transformation support.
keyOffering: Work closely with a senior HR Consultant to drive change, build people strategies, and align HR with business outcomes.

Organizational Development: Implementation of major initiatives (e.g., HR software)
